title: Enterprise Sobha Portal Scraper Input
description: Configuration for the enterprise-grade Sobha Partner Portal scraper.

email.title: Sobha Portal Email
email.description: Your login email for the Sobha Partner Portal.

password.title: Sobha Portal Password
password.description: Your login password. This is a secret field.

scrapeMode.title: Scrape Mode
scrapeMode.description: Choose 'bulk' to scrape multiple properties or 'specific' for a single unit.

filters.title: Property Filters
filters.description: Apply filters for bulk scraping. E.g., {"bedrooms": "1 Bed Type C", "project": "Sobha SeaHaven"}

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: The maximum number of properties to scrape.

parallelRequests.title: Parallel Requests
parallelRequests.description: Number of parallel browser instances to run.

enableStealth.title: Enable Stealth Mode
enableStealth.description: Use advanced techniques to avoid anti-bot detection.
